ability.Chisel Guard: This Pokemon's Defense is increased by 1 stage when hit by a Physical move.
ability.Spear Strike: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage when this Pokemon attacks with a Physical move.

Gleaming Spear.effect: Has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.

Shield Bash.effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage after dealing damage.

Muddy Assault.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Feral Roar.effect: Lowers the Attack of the target by 1 stage each in the next three turns.
